intro-description-1: Any subject Anytime Anyone and Anywhere
intro-description-2: Learn, Teach Improve your Knowledge about anything
resolver-prova-desc: Take public tests to train your knowledge, or a private test to be evaluated. Filter exams by content, size, difficulty or popularity.
criar-prova-desc: Create public tests for everyone to solve, or create a private test. Use public questions created by others or create your own questions.
corrigir-prova-desc: Correct your tests solved by others. Multiple-choice questions are automatically corrected. Make a comment on each question
historico-desc: See all the tests already created and solved by you. Track your progress and grades. See teachers' corrections to your completed tests.
prova-privada-desc: Take a private test from an unique and secret ID
prova-publica-desc: Take public tests to study and improve your knowledge. See the correction right after taking the tests
provas-resolvidas-desc: See all tests taken by you
provas-criadas-desc: See all tests created by you
nome-pequeno: Name must contain at least 6 characters!
senha-pequena: Password must contain at least 8 characters!
senha-invalida: Password must contain at least one capital letter, one special character, one number and 8 characters!
data-invalida: Invalid date! You can only take this test between
tempo-esgotado-salvo: Time is over! All your progress has been saved!
prova-aviso-1: The test must have at least one question!
prova-aviso-2: One or more questions have invalid value!
prova-aviso-3: The test must allow at least one attempt!
prova-aviso-5: The test must contain at least one subject!
conteudo-aviso-2: Write the name of the subject
data-prova: Date allowed to take the test:
questao-aviso-2: The question must be worth more than 0!
questao-aviso-3: The question must belong to at least one subject!
questao-aviso-5: Only one correct alternative is allowed
erro-generico: Something went wrong! Try again later
erro-questao-invalida: One or more questions have an invalid grade!
aviso-prova-corrigida: Test successfully corrected! You can change the correction as many times as you like!
aviso-questao-valor: The question value must be greater than 0
